title: Cass vs kata
body: Will Kata{{champion:55}}  be slowed or stuned when getting a Cass {{champion:69}} ult while ulting herself( rotating ) ? ...{{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
While this is an interesting point, Kats bs combo will kill you in 0.0000000001 sec, not even enough time for your mind to even register that you need 
to press R, rendering the whole thing pointless :(

You're facing whichever way you were before you hit R (It doesn't actually calculate you as rotating)

So if you ult Cass as Kat however, because Shunpo faces your opponent afterwards you need to Shunpo then right click to face away then ulti - that way Cass ulti wont stun you unless she flashes to other side of you.

Depends which way she is facing?

(i really don't know.)

EDIT: from the wiki

>The facing direction of champions whose abilities/animations cause them to spin is always the direction they are moving in. In the event of abilities that cause the champion to spin on the spot, such as KatarinaSquare.png Katarina's Death Lotus.png Death Lotus, it will factor the direction they were facing on-cast.
